Question 73) The history of May 1, 1890 - in France and Europe, the first of the first of May - is, in many ways, exemplary. As a result of a deliberate political act, this manifestation illustrates the voluntary side of the construction of a class - the working class - to which socialists try to give political and cultural unity through that pedagogy of the party whose principle, effectiveness and limits had long been experienced by the French Revolution.
Perrot, M. The excluded from history: workers, women and prisoners. Rio de Janeiro: Peace and Earth, 1988.
Based on the text, the fixation of this commemorative date was intended
A) Value a bourgeois feeling.
B) affirm a collective identity.
C) Build a national memory.
D) Create a civic community.
E) define a popular tradition.
